summary: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.
cast: Kevin Spacey|Paul Bettany|Jeremy Irons|Zachary Quinto|Penn Badgley|Simon Baker|Mary McDonnell|Demi Moore|Stanley Tucci|Aasif Mandvi|Ashley Williams|Susan Blackwell|Maria Dizzia|Jimmy Palumbo|Al Sapienza|Peter Kim|Grace Gummer|Oberon K.A. Adjepong|Claude Jay|Kevin Keels|Jason Liebman|Jamie Lee Petronis|Uzimann|Steven Weisz
keywords: financial crisis|financial disaster|capital management|investment fraud|21st century
title: Margin Call
